comment: I've been using Spotify for over a decade, been paying for premium the majority of the time as well. Over the past year, the ability to listen to downloaded music "offline" has failed. It's the main reason I pay for premium; I live in a rural area with spotty cell service coverage & therefore would rely on my downloaded music to listen to on long drives. It's upsetting that this paid-for feature isn't working the way it should be. AND you raised the price for premium when it doesn't fully work.
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Downloaded', 'description': 'View only downloaded playlists'}, {'name': 'Filter by Playlists', 'description': 'Filter content to show only playlists'}, {'name': 'Filter by Podcasts', 'description': 'Filter content to show only podcasts'}, {'name': 'Sort Content', 'description': 'Change the sorting order of displayed content'}, {'name': 'Change View Mode', 'description': 'Switch between different view modes (e.g., grid view, list view)'}]

operations.event: click<button id=26 alt="Downloaded, show only downloaded.">  </button>
